title: Sr. Back-end dev
description: We’re looking for someone with at least 3 years of experience with Python and PHP to join our team. Advanced english is required. Salary in euros.

title: Ssr. UX Designer
description: Are you a UX Designer with experience in the fintech field? we’re looking for you! Applications without a portfolio won’t be taken into consideration.

title: Project Manager
description: We’re a creative agency dedicated mainly to the gaming industry. We need a PM who has experience handling projects for the europan market. An advance level of spanish is a plus.
